trans-unit.source: Specifies that video controls should be displayed (such as a play/pause button etc).
video that will start over again, every time it is finished.
Specifies that the audio output of the video should be muted. Note: Enabled on autoplay because some browsers ignore that attribute if the video is not muted.
Specifies if and how the author thinks the video should be loaded when the page loads. Note: The preload attribute is ignored if autoplay is present.
Loads video sources after pageload. Can improve the side loading time.
